text: David Olatukunbo Alaba (born 24 June 1992) is an Austrian defender who plays currently for Real Madrid and the Austria national football team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National CupIncludes DFB-Pokal Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Bayern Munich II 2009–10 3\.
